body: And this marks the first book of my favorite euro-doujin series with probably more plot than over half this site combined. If only he actually finished it :/
Sad that he kinda forgets about Cirno and just goes around fucking other (little) girls, but I just hate harems
For those who want to know, "(C77) [Nounai Kanojo (Kishiri Toworu)] Hakurei Jinja no Reimu-san | Reimu of the Hakurei Shrine (Touhou Project) [English] [U MAD]" is the next one after this.
Wait a second yukari did not eat the human
